titlealts.searchtitle: Data Element: BAYLEY III SOCIAL-EMOTIONAL TOTAL RAW SCORE - Description

div.p: BAYLEY III SOCIAL-EMOTIONAL TOTAL RAW SCORE is the total raw score PERSON SCORE for the Social-Emotional sub-scale of the Bayley Scales of Infant and Toddler Development (Third Edition).
The score is in the range of 0-200.
